evidence.location: Page 1 of 7, Section 'Complaint (Civil Rights of Institutionalized Persons Act, Americans with Disabilities Act)'
evidence.text: The United States files this Complaint pursuant to the Civil Rights of Institutionalized Persons Act, 42 U.S.C. § 1997 (CRIPA), and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, as amended, 42 U.S.C. §§ 12131-12134 (ADA), to enjoin the Defendant
